title: Herb Elliott says 'Take five and stay alive'
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Cinesound
brief_description: Herb Elliott is shown breaking the four minute mile and discussing his training. Just as poor training and condition can cause an injury which will put a runner out for the season, so a faulty motor and bad driving can put a driver and others out, perhaps for life.
